blogPost.excerpt: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
blogPost.body: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
blogPost.title: Per Diem - Subscriptions for local businesses
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Per Diem使本地企业可以轻松地在线销售订阅，并为他们提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。
Per Diem使本地企業可以輕鬆地在線銷售訂閱，併爲他們提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。

previous.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
previous.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth

localize.description: Take a Walk让您可以在世界各地进行虚拟散步，按国家、时间和天气进行筛选。欣赏世界各地的城市风光，聆听它们的声音，放松心情!
localize.tagline: 在地球上你最喜欢的地方放松

localize.description: Take a Walk讓您可以在世界各地進行虛擬散步，按國家、時間和天氣進行篩選。欣賞世界各地的城市風光，聆聽它們的聲音，放鬆心情!
localize.tagline: 在地球上你最喜歡的地方放鬆

next.excerpt: This iOS widget pack allows you to track your Gumroad analytics with beautiful charts on your iPhone or iPad's home screen via iOS shortcuts. The dashboard pulls in metrics from Gumroad such as orders/revenue, plus breaks down your most popular products. 📊
next.title: Gumroad Sales Dashboard for iOS - iOS widget to track Gumroad sales on the home screen

localize.description: 这个iOS小工具包允许您通过iOS快捷键在您的iPhone或iPad的主屏幕上用漂亮的图表来跟踪您的Gumroad分析。仪表板拉在Gumroad的指标，如订单/收入，再加上打破你最流行的产品。📊
localize.tagline: 在主屏幕上跟踪Gumroad销售的iOS小工具

localize.description: 這個iOS小工具包允許您通過iOS快捷鍵在您的iPhone或iPad的主屏幕上用漂亮的圖表來跟蹤您的Gumroad分析。儀表板拉在Gumroad的指標，如訂單/收入，再加上打破你最流行的產品。📊
localize.tagline: 在主屏幕上跟蹤Gumroad銷售的iOS小工具
